page.title: 11TRADE (FASHION)
page.content: IN 1981{MARJORIE GRANT}opened a dress shop in the lodge house at Mowden Hall school.She opens 5 days a week-Tuesday to Saturday-and also takes clothes out to clients at home.This may be because they are elderly or handicapped although visiting the shop is easy as cars can park right at her door and everything is on the level.Many busy farmers wives come twice a year to stock up with clothes for the season ahead,sizes range from 10-26 and alterations can be done if neccessary. Another advantage of the shop is the fact that hats,handbags and other accessories are also sold so that matching up can be done without trudging from shop to shop,especially useful in the case of wedding outfits.
